document.full_text: alcoa inc  shares rose 3 percent on tuesday on market talk that rio tinto   was lining up a bid to buy the u.s. aluminum company, but sources said two banks rumored to be financing the deal were not involved.
document.title: alcoa shares rise on rio tinto rumor
lines_and_colors: alcoa inc  shares rose 3 percent on tuesday on market talk that rio tinto   was lining up a bid to buy the u.s. aluminum company, but sources said two banks rumored to be financing the deal were not involved.
